question_text:
Question
 37
A  theodolite is set up at station A. The  RL of  instrument axis is 212.250 m. The angle of elevation to 
the top of a 4 m long staff, held vertical at station B, is 
0
7
 . The horizontal distance between stations A 
and B is 400 m Neglecting the errors due to curvature of earth and refraction, the RL (in m
, round off to 
three decimal places
) of station B is _______.
